subject: VAM PRO
description_text:
Hello,

The VAM PRO haptics I received are not working. I have updated the manager software and am using SIMHUB however I have no feedback on both reactors. 


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Francisco Vega,     Please open the "Vibration Feedback" interface in SIMSONN MANAGER 2.0.8 and check if the power indicator is green. A green icon means the power is successfully connected. You can test the vibration function directly on this screen.  If the device is not shown as connected, try reconnecting the USB and power cables. Make sure to plug in the USB first, then the power, to ensure proper initialization.         Please make sure you are using SimHub version 9.9.3 to ensure full compatibility and feature support.Â
